mapper.sql: create_time, create_by, update_time, update_by, product_id, materiel_id, clientele_id, units_id, materiel_num, materiel_name, specification, model_name, need_torque, out_torque, units_name, price, status
mapper.select:
select m.materiel_id, m.materiel_num, m.materiel_name, m.specification, m.need_torque, m.out_torque, m.price, u.units_id,u.units_name,c.category_id,c.category_name, mm.model_name, mm.pk_id from sys_materiel m left join sys_units u on u.units_id=m.units_id left join sys_materiel_model mm on mm.m_id=m.materiel_id left join sys_category c on c.category_id=m.category_id and c.category='0'
m.del_flag='0' and m.status='0'
and mm.pk_id not in (select scp.pk_id from sys_clientele_product scp where scp.clientele_id = #{mat.clienteleId} and scp.materiel_id=m.materiel_id and scp.model_name=mm.model_name)
and m.materiel_num like concat(concat('%',#{mat.materielNum}),'%')
or m.materiel_name like concat(concat('%',#{mat.materielName}),'%')
and c.category_id=#{mat.categoryId}
order by m.create_time desc
